article.headline: N.J. Tech 78, Longwood 74
article.story: FARMVILLE, Va. (AP) -- Nesho Milosevic scored 21 points and had 10 rebounds and Marc Milbourne Swan added 19 points to lead New Jersey Institute of Technology to a 78-74 win over Longwood on Monday night. A jumper by Swan with 12:54 left in the game put the Highlanders (5-20) ahead for good. Maurice Sumter led Longwood (9-20) with 26 points, including a layup with 3:49 remaining that narrowed the Highlanders' lead to 2 points. Kirk Williams added 19 for the Lancers. Longwood led 38-34 at the half, but a layup by Milbourne Swan tied things up with 14:06 to go. He followed with a jumper to put the Highlanders ahead by two, but a layup by Sumter evened the score again. The Highlanders pulled ahead for good on another Milbourne Swan jumper. NJIT outshot the Lancers 51.7 percent to 39.3 percent and outrebounded Longwood 37-36.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.
